mapper.sql: d.id, d.code, d.name, d.type_code as typeCode, d.sort, d.remark, d.create_id as createId, d.create_time as createTime, d.update_id as updateId, d.update_time as updateTime, d.usable
mapper.select: select s.code as code, s.code as value, s.name as label from tb_system_data s where s.usable = 1 and s.type_code = #{typeCode} order by s.sort
select s.code as code, s.code as value, s.name as label from tb_system_type s where s.usable = 1 order by s.update_time desc

select
, t.name as typeName from tb_system_data d left join tb_system_type t on t.code = d.type_code where d.usable = 1
and d.type_code = #{typeCode}
order by d.update_time desc
